Introduction
This topic contains information on adjusting apportioned awards, including
handling a retroactive increase in a primary beneficiary’s award
circumstances requiring discontinuation of an apportionment
discontinuing an apportionment
other reasons and instructions for discontinuing an apportionment
general instructions for handling notice of a change in the status of an apportionee or primary beneficiary
handling notice that a primary beneficiary and apportionee now reside together
apportionments based on criteria that are no longer in effect
handling requests for adjustment of an apportionment
apportionments the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) suspended because payments were returned as undeliverable
removing a former apportionee from a beneficiary’s award because the former apportionee’s whereabouts are unknown
, and
requests for resumption of an apportionment that VA suspended or discontinued because payments were returned as undeliverable
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Adjusting Apportioned Awards
citation: Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
